Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: True intuitive expertise is learned from prolonged experience with good feedback on mistakes

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a very narrow view of what is going on

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is time to reflect, slowing down is likely to be a good idea

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: Slow thinking has the feeling of something you do. It's deliberate

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you analyze happiness, it turns out that the way you spend your time is extremely important

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: If individuals are rational, there is no need to protect them against their own choices

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: The concept of happiness has to be reorganised

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have data without information, but you cannot have information without data

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very strange writing science fiction in a world that moves as fast as ours does

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: The universe is not fair and it is never going to be fair

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Plot and character are virtually the same thing

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Writers, all the good ones, are Natural Born Liars

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors are good liars; writers are good liars with good memories

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: To write well you must be willing to go naked into the world

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, the future of the Internet is... Reality

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: It's your body and your life and you have an absolute right to do with it as you choose

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: The welfare system in the United States is vile

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people think I am gay, which I think is awesome

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not much of a cake person

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: People do incredible things for love, particularly for unrequited love

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm also a fan of ridiculously coloured and patterned socks

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not clumsy, I'm just accident prone

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, I prefer the dark side

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm possibly a very morbid person but I think about death a lot

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Shyness displays itself differently in me. I think it's more an awkwardness

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not clumsy, I'm accident-prone!

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try too hard to be something you're not

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no refuge from confession but suicide; and suicide is confession

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born an American; I will live an American; I shall die an American

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: The contest for ages has been to rescue liberty from the grasp of executive power

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: A country cannot subsist well without liberty, nor liberty without virtue

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: How little do they see what really is, who frame their hasty judgment upon that which seems

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is more frequently from want of energy than want of capital

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: The materials of wealth are in the earth, in the seas, and in their natural and unaided productions

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always room at the top

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom begins at the end

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really care about awards

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a classic gym teacher in junior high who wore a weightlifter's belt all the time

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: The dynamics are pretty much the same among me and my friends as they were when I was 18 years old

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't even remember not wanting to go to film school

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: On a human level, people want to see someone succeed who wants to change

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't tend to watch too many American comedies. I love British comedy

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a big battle to bring quality stuff into theaters across America, for sure

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I made movies all the time when I was a kid

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no future for me as a closing pitcher

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hospitality exists when you believe that the other person is on your side

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hospitality is almost impossible to teach. It's all about hiring the right people

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: A cocktail done right can really show your guests that you care

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you franchise hospitality?

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Union Square Cafe is all soul, not brain

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Good service means never having to ask for anything

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hospitality knows no gender or race

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Use your time well. Everyone gets time equally. It doesn't matter how much money you make

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Festive cocktails mean color, lots of color

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Reject what you don't want. Get rid of dead wood

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody really cares about what other people think anymore; they're all about themselves

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: The first thing I ever did was play talent shows at the Uptown Theater and the Adelphi Ballroom

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: As I got older, my voice got better

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I always looked up to people like B.B. King and Ray Charles

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I travel in unusual circles. George Osborne and his wife Frances are my cousins

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like showboating. I was never a fan of showing off

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody's going to sell 10 million records by not working hard

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Chronic Lyme causes arthritis, heart problems, stroke - even death

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: If you work hard and you're good, you can build something for yourself

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I really loved Indians. Native Americans. Pardon. Me

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: Doesn't matter what you say or do; people can always find a way to call you a dick

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind a crowd's not laughing; it's the groans that slow down the show

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a movie guy, I'm not a TV sitcom guy, but whatever seems to fit and is funny is good for me

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no grand scheme

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm a star or a celebrity or any thing like that

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted to be famous

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch reality TV. I'm cool

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: I like writing a joke, and I like when a joke works, and I like other comics who tell jokes

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it's hard to tell if a joke is working or not for the first couple of minutes

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: Fishing is boring, unless you catch an actual fish, and then it is disgusting

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a big enough dictionary, just about everything is a word

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: As a child, I was more afraid of tetanus shots than, for example, Dracula

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: The Sixties are now considered a historical period, just like the Roman Empire

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: The real threat to whales is whaling, which has endangered many whale species

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: Never under any circumstances take a sleeping pill and a laxative on the same night

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: The nuclear generator of brain sludge is television

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you must be doing something right if old people like you

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being famous - it's phenomenal

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: The language you are about to hear... is disturbing

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every group of black guys should have at least one white guy in it

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: You can become famous but you can't become unfamous. You can become infamous but not unfamous

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an introspective dude

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing harder than leaving show business is coming back

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Ohio

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want the money. I don't want the drama. I just want to do my show. I want to have fun again

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing to do is to be true to yourself, especially when everybody is watching

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not that our family has no taste, it's just that our family's taste is inconsistent

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm far too hopeful and trusting. That's something I got from my mum

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: People are strange, but more than that, they're good. They're good first, then strange

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never had WiFi at home. I'm too easily distracted, and YouTube is too tempting

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I publish my own books, so there isn't a certain editor I owe the book to at a publishing house

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to public school all my life and all through college and I liked it

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: The house is a factory

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: They took my mother's stomach out six months ago

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I had grown up as a fan of Studs Terkel. In Chicago he sort of looms large and is mentioned often

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: I worked at magazines for over 10 years before I even thought of writing a book

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's gathering people together to do something fun

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: All I really had was a suitcase and my drums. So I took them up to Seattle and hoped it would work

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: Through Kurt I saw the beauty of minimalism and the importance of music that's stripped down

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: I love everything about my job, except being away from the kids

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: I stopped doing drugs when I was 20. I was finished with drugs before Nirvana even started

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: Ladies and gentlemen, god bless America - land of the free, home of the brave

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: Dude, maybe not everyone loves 'Glee.' Me included. I watched 10 minutes and it wasn't my thing

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I never liked being told what to do. It's one of the reasons I dropped out of school

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: People are so into digital recording now they forgot how easy analog recording can be

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: My songwriting is like extending a hand to the listener

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll lean on you and you lean on me and we'll be okay

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: I never went to college - I barely got out of high school

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: The world and the universe are far more wonderful if there's not a puppet master

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow is no place to place your better days

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: Good music is good music, and everything else can go to hell

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a freedom to being young that is harder to come by as time goes on

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: In so many areas of life, I'm a spaz and incompetent

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: How could I have been anyone other than me?

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: My guitar was a loyal person to me

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: What I couldn't say verbally I was able to express physically through the guitar

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not how big your pencil is; it's how you write your name

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: If you guys are going to be throwing beer bottles at us, at least make sure they're full

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I treat people the way I want to be treated, which makes me odd

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't like the way I was let go from Metallica

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I care more about what God knows than what man says

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Next thing you know they'll take your thoughts away

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Megadeth doesn't sound anything like Metallica

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be in debt and win. It doesn't work

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to tell your money what to do or it will leave

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the things we buy are wants. And we call them needs, but they're wants

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no shortcuts when it comes to getting out of debt

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: Credit is an 'I love debt' score

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I have done stupid with a lot of zeros on the end of it. I know what it looks like

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to teach children about money intentionally - create teachable moments

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: You need some quick wins in order to stay pumped enough to get out of debt completely

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that anyone who wants to start their own business can, but not any type of business

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: Crying wolf is a real danger

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to steer a course between not appalling people, but at the same time not misleading them

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can bicycle, I bicycle

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: We are a plague on the Earth

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a moral question about whether we have the right to exterminate species

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we're lucky to be living when we are, because things are going to get worse

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm having a good time. Which makes me feel guilty too. How very English

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wish the world was twice as big and half of it was still unexplored

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Being handsome wasn't much of a burden. It worked for me

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: The skull is nature's sculpture

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Rockers are the nicest people to photograph. They have no inhibitions

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can be a great photographer if they zoom in enough on what they love

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate being so nostalgic about the Sixties

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think my work does reflect my nationality - I don't like the idea of nationalism

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Kate Moss is the best thing since Jean Shrimpton, really

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I still look at myself and want to improve

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: People react to criticism in different ways, and my way is definitely to come out fighting

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: As a footballer, you always want to test yourself against the best

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: There's room for boys' and girls' football in the world-that's what I believe

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: Soccer is a magical game

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever I do, I want to be the best

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: Always have something to look forward to

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every situation has changed me as a person

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence - hard work

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a strong person, I'm a strong family man, I'm a strong husband and a strong father

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that fear of life brings a greater fear of death

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, I was a kid growing up with a single mother in Brooklyn

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I always was obsessed with Houdini

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I was obsessed with the idea of fasting and isolation

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: My only fear is the unknown

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all capable of infinitely more than we believe

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I have not had time to reflect on my own truths in many years

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to bring magic back to the place it used to be 100 years ago

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I think great whites are the most beautiful and perfect creatures I've ever seen

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: If I asked you to stand in one spot for 35 hours or a certain length of time, you could do it

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: That is why with enormous regret I have tendered my resignation to the prime minister today

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not in late November start the plethora of linking my private life with public events again

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: Throughout my political life, I've not been a stranger to controversy

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have made mistakes in the past, but when I have, I have always said so

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I should have been a Trappist monk

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a mistake to separate learning for work and for community and personal development

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is only worthwhile if you are doing what you believe, regardless of the slings and arrows

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have built my reputation on honesty, I have sometimes been too honest

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone can say I have said one thing in public and done another in private

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never tried to fiddle my role as leader of the city of Sheffield, as an MP or as a minister

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: You create a community with music, not just at concerts but by talking about it with your friends

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Analysis is like a lobotomy. Who wants to have all their edges shaved off?

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything's intentional. It's just filling in the dots

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Life tends to be an accumulation of a lot of mundane decisions, which often gets ignored

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I wanted to have a doll of myself on the cover. I thought, I wanna see myself as a Ken doll

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite time of day is to get up and eat leftovers from dinner, especially spicy food

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the one for my tombstone... Here lies David Byrne. Why the big suit?

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Punk was defined by an attitude rather than a musical style

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: To shake your rump is to be environmentally aware

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a country boy at heart

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I know the British people and they are not passengers - they are drivers

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Countries are different. They make different choices. We cannot harmonise everything

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Terms are like shredded wheat - two are wonderful, but three might just be too many

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: The best route out of poverty, to avoid food bank usage, is to make sure more people get a job

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the future once

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Any government I lead will continue with the equality of gay and lesbian people

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: Britain is characterized not just by its independence but, above all, by its openness

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: More of the same will just produce more of the same: less competitiveness, less growth, fewer jobs

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: There is not, in my view, a single European demos

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to just breeze on by

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone tries to compare cooks to rock stars. I see more comparisons to the fashion world

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: I work so hard that I forget to take care of myself

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always criticizing and only see the mistakes

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: People are trying to figure out what American food is; it's certainly an amalgamation

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is a driving force for most of the things that I do. I don't know if that's healthy

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: The process and organization leading up to cooking the egg can tell you a lot about the cook

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: The livelihood of the restaurant is dependent upon getting the word out

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to disprove the notion that you couldn't open a great restaurant in a casino

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the real heroic teachers are the ones who work with kids, like my mom and my sister do

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm half Jewish, half Scottish. It's hard for me to buy anything

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of stupid when it comes to gadgets

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I still feel like I haven't grown up

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I lost my virginity when I was 14. And I haven't been able to find it

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a gamer

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I always dreamt of being a basketball player. A dream that only I believed in

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: I may be learning guitar, but I'll never be able to sing

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: People always love and respect characters who speak the truth, even if the truth hurts

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a silly old game

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm swinging well, nobody hits the golf ball any better than I do

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: But you know, I'm just not a quitter

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen the bottom and I know the difference between good golf and bad golf

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just been working hard, trying to get some good stuff to come out

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is such a fragile and precious thing

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: You do what you need to if you're serious about playing great golf

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: We're often portrayed as rich, spoiled athletes who play a game for too much money

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: And if people do like me, I think it's because I'm a stand-up guy

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: I know the other side. I know what awful golf is

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything seems really simple on paper until you take a camera out of the box

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think intelligence is totally subjective; it's like sexiness

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of professionalism is probably a lot of people's idea of obsessive
